value:
$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|I wanted to thank you for earlier,
Linde, and...I also have some more
questions for you. Can you help me?$k$p$WmMPID_双界リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_FF_Pair,Face|Of course. Whatever you need!$k$p$nMPID_サラ|You really are just like a professor.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Khadein,Face|My Khadein experience has been
quite fruitful.$k$pI must thank $Nu
for the invitation.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|Indeed. I have encountered many
sources of quality information.
I've...enjoyed myself.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインセネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Khadein,Face|I've had my fill. Let's finish our
work here and make our return.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_双界リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_FF_Pair,Face|I'm exhausted... Why don't we take
a little break?$k$p$nMPID_サラ|You helped to teach so many people,
and you spent so much time with
them, I'm exhausted thinking about it.$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|I...have to be honest, Sara.$k$pAfter working with so many students
of magic, I've learned something
about myself.$k$pI'm still not ready.$k$p$nMPID_サラ|Really? But you knew all the right
things to say, though!$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|It felt to me like I was only barely
managing to keep up with it all.$k$pMy father always seemed to know
everything, but he had years to
accumulate all his knowledge.$k$pI've long wished to grow into
someone like my father—someone
who can serve as a guide to others...$k$pBut...I forgot that I still have much
to learn. I feel a bit embarrassed.$k$p$nMPID_サラ|Don't be so hard on yourself!$k$pYou're always trying so hard... I think
you're already a great mage, Linde.$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|Sara...$k$p$nMPID_サラ|Besides, even if it's too much for you
now, you still have time to learn.
Your father had years of experience!$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|I hope it doesn't take quite that long
for me to get better...$k$p$nMPID_サラ|It won't if you keep working hard!$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|Hee hee... I suppose you're right.
Thank you, Sara.$k$pI swear, in Khadein's name, I will
continue to study magic until I am as
wise and experienced as my father!$k$p$Sbs150|
